CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 8, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Pittsburghers Enjoy a Sporting Holiday Weekend - Battle of Kings - Homer Klater and Sherman Harmon (left), defending doubles champions of the Schenley Park Tennis Association, discussed net angles with challengers Wallace Richard and Dr. Verne Wright, before they clashed in a championship match Monday on the Schenley Park courts.  The Richards-Wright team dethroned Klater and Harmon. They're the new champions. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Doubles tennis teams Homer Klater and Sherman Harmon, and Wallace Richards and Dr. Verne Wright, standing at net on Schenley Park tennis courts
